All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Board
The Board class holds a 2D array of Cell objects, representing a 5x5 grid in the Santorini board game.
Cell
Represents a single cell on the Santorini board.
Check
Provides static methods to validate moves, construction, and game statuses in the Santorini board game.
GameController
PROTOTYPE Controls the overall flow of the game, managing turn order and the current GameState.
GameState
Represents the various states the game can be in: STARTING (players place workers), RUNNING (standard game loop), ENDED (game has a winner).
IDMaker
A thread-safe singleton class generating unique incremental IDs.
Main
The Main class is the entry point for the Santorini board game application.
Player
Represents a player in the Santorini board game.
PlayerColor
Enumeration of possible player colors in Santorini: RED or BLUE.
Tower
Represents a tower in the Santorini board game.
Worker
Represents a worker in the Santorini board game.
WorkerStatus
Tracks whether a cell currently has a worker present or absent.
